wordpressPost.title: Paper or electrons
wordpressPost.content: Was really looking forward to making today's blog a review of SteamPunk Magazine, but it so happened that I haven't really managed to read it yet so all I can say about it thusfar is that it's a rather nicely built item with some very solid reading and interesting things. It's so interesting as to get stolen by a classmate … If you're looking into reading this, you should go paper because electrons just don't do it justice.
